PhantomL0rd TV - Changelog

1.0.7 (25/09/2017): Updated changelog.
1.0.6 (23/09/2017): Fixed buttons in popout not linking correctly.
1.0.5 (22/09/2017): Fixes for YouTube chat name colors not showing.
1.0.4 (12/09/2017): Bug fixed and performance improvements.
1.0.3 (22/08/2017): Added support for custom notifications.
1.0.2 (03/08/2017): Added streaming schedule.
1.0.1 (20/07/2017): PhantomL0rd emotes and more links in extension popup.
1.0.0 (17/07/2017): Initial release.

Developed by Andries (@andries_dev)
